name: chocoLOT!
description:
A little game that was originally intended for Valentine's Day, but you can play it any time you wish! You must make the chocolate.

Suitable for all ages.

Credits:

Game by Leaflet Games.

Pixel sprites and talking sprites by shiro*hana.

Chocolate-themed images and tileset by Onikasima.

Other assets by RPG Maker MV.
